hello: Hello! Welcome to the Neuro FarmÔºÅ
help_text:
Here are the available commands:
/hello - Greet the bot
/plant - Plant crops
/breed - Breed animals
/explore - Explore regions
/market - Visit the flea market
/shop - Visit the shop
/fish - Go fishing
/mahjong - Play mahjong
/quest - Start a quest
/open_chest - Open a treasure chest
/boss_fight - Start a boss fight
explore_result: You have explored the {region} region and found some interesting items!
market_welcome: Welcome to the flea market! What would you like to trade today?
shop_welcome: Welcome to the shop! What would you like to buy?
mahjong_start: A game of mahjong has started!
quest_start: You have started a new quest. Good luck!
chest_opened: You opened the chest and found some valuable items!
boss_fight_start: A boss has appeared! Prepare for battle!
